title_ssm: The third annual induction ceremony. 1988. Overlap Reel #2
title_si: The third annual induction ceremony. 1988. Overlap Reel #2
summary_teim: Footage beginning after the final performance of the 1988 annual induction ceremony. Featuring performers talking and shaking hands with other performers.
summary_ssm: Footage beginning after the final performance of the 1988 annual induction ceremony. Featuring performers talking and shaking hands with other performers.
contents_teim: Ahmet Ertegun hugging Bruce Springsteen -- George Harrison talking to Ahmet Ertegun -- Bruce Springsteen talking to Bob Dylan -- Springsteen talking to musicians -- Ahmet Ertegun talking with Neil Young -- Paul Shaffer greeting other people.

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony on January 20, 1988. This is footage from the end of the show, after the performance.
